details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-2:2024 - 8.11 Metadata - 8.11.1 General - Dc title
details.description: The Metadata stream as specified in ISO 32000-2:2020, 14.3 in the document catalog dictionary shall contain a dc:title entry

rule.description: The Metadata stream as specified in ISO 32000-2:2020, 14.3 in the document catalog dictionary shall contain a dc:title entry

error.message: Metadata stream does not contain dc:title
